# updates(count:)

**Type Method**

Creates an update-style badge with an integer count and a predefined label that represents the number of available updates.

## Declaration

```swift
class func updates(count itemCount: Int) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **itemCount**: The badge count.

## Return Value

Returns a new badge item of type [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSMenuItemBadge/BadgeType/updates].

## Creating badges of a specific type

- **alerts(count:)**: Creates an alert-style badge with an integer count and a predefined label that represents the number of alerts.
- **newItems(count:)**: Creates a new item-style badge with an integer count and a predefined label that represents the number of new items.
- **NSMenuItemBadge.BadgeType**: Constants that define types of badges for display.
